query.statement: SELECT A.UPJANG, A.EDU_SEQ, A.EDU_CD, (SELECT NM_KOR FROM HR_PERSONAL WHERE SABUN = A.EDU_SABUN) AS EDU_NM, A.EDU_SABUN, A.EDU_SDATE, A.EDU_EDATE, A.OBJ_CD, A.EDU_TIME_CD, (SELECT B.TM_NM FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V B WHERE A.UPJANG=B.UPJANG AND A.OP_DEPT=B.TM_CD) AS OP_DEPT, A.CDATE, A.UUSER, A.UDATE, A.CUSER, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM FCUS.CCS_EDU_MGMT_IMGE B WHERE 1=1 AND A.UPJANG = B.UPJANG AND A.EDU_SEQ = B.EDU_SEQ) AS IMGE_CNT FROM FCUS.CCS_EDU_MGMT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.UPJANG = #UPJANG# ORDER BY A.EDU_SDATE DESC
